main event: A round object the size of a pinhead was observed in the clear sky above San Bernardino for about 20 minutes.
interesting points: The object moved with small magnitude and remained in essentially one position., The sighting was initially believed to possibly be a balloon due to weather conditions., The object was noted while watching a commercial 727 Boeing aircraft., The observation took place at a 60-degree angle above the northern horizon., It was documented as part of Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program investigating UFO reports.
sighted object: round object size of a pinhead
witness description: civilian, observed while watching a commercial aircraft
